name: Integrate NP Shipping
author: Lugano

sections.description: Integrate NP Shipping is a free plugin for WooCommerce that allows you to sell simpler, beautifully. Built to integrate most popular Ukrainian shipping system Nova Poshta with WooCommerce is the world’s favorite eCommerce solution that gives both store owners and developers complete control.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/integrate-np-shipping directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Proceed to WooCommerce->Settings->Shipping->Novaposhta Shipping screen to configure the plugin

`
